name: Sea Treasure - Pirate Run
description:
#### Hi Everyone,

It is a #survival #Trade #Game, but you have to avoid #pirate s while trading between ports. You can destroy other  pirates with the their Cannon balls and collect the falling #treasure. your goal is to have the greatest treasure of the #seas.

Planned Updates:
- Free Trade Ships
- Buyable or Collectible ships
- Pirate Fortresses
- Better water effects
- Bigger Map

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bilalarikan.stpr
